articles.title: Trained Rats To Wear Tiny Backpacks To Save Earthquake Survivors
articles.description: Scientists are training rats to rescue people trapped during earthquakes. Specialist backpacks containing microphones and video gear as well as location trackers will be created in order to allow rescue teams to communicate with survivors.
articles.content:
So far, seven rats have been trained to respond to beeping sounds.
In a strange development, scientists are training rats to rescue people trapped during earthquakes.
